text: Herring fishermen call this "the outset". It is strongest at spring tides, when without it works, it may well be that this outset, akin to the mouth of a great salmon river, has been the biggest factor through the ages in the constancy of this great herring fishery.
handwritten_text: Herring fishermen call this "the outset". It is strongest at spring tides, when without it works, it may well be that this outset, akin to the mouth of a great salmon river, has been the biggest factor through the ages in the constancy of this great herring fishery.
